response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than what the market typically offers. Considering its true value and your potential benefit, I propose to sell it to you for $120. This price not only reflects its worth but also provides you with an opportunity to save compared to what others might pay. I'm confident this deal will be mutually beneficial. Let me know if you're interested!", "product_price": 120}
